net.canarymod.api

Interface DamageSource


  • public interface DamageSource
    DamageSource wrapper
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity getDamageDealer()
      Get the entity that caused the damage.
      DamageType getDamagetype()
      Return the DamageType of this damage
      java.lang.String getDeathMessage(Player player)
      Get death message for this DamageSource
      float getHungerDamage()
      How much hunger will be added by indulging this damage type
      java.lang.String getNativeName()
      Gets the name used within Native Minecraft Sources
      boolean isCritical()
      Gets if the DamageSource includes a critical hit.
      boolean isFireDamage()
      Check if this is fire damage
      boolean isProjectile()
      Check if this is projectile damage
      boolean isUnblockable()
      Check if this damage is unblockable (penetrates armor and can't be held off by blocking it)
      void setCustomDeathMessage(java.lang.String deathmessage)
      Set a custom death message to this damage type.
      void setHungerDamage(float hunger)
      Set the amount of hunger this damage costs
      void setUnblockable(boolean blockable)
      Set this damagetype as unblockable or not
      boolean validInCreativeMode()
      Can this damage be dealt against an entity in creative mode?

    • Method Detail

      • validInCreativeMode

        boolean validInCreativeMode()
        Can this damage be dealt against an entity in creative mode?
        Returns:
        true if valid, false if not

      • isFireDamage

        boolean isFireDamage()
        Check if this is fire damage
        Returns:
        true if fire damage; false if not

      • isProjectile

        boolean isProjectile()
        Check if this is projectile damage
        Returns:
        true if projectile damage; false if not

      • getDamagetype

        DamageType getDamagetype()
        Return the DamageType of this damage
        Returns:
        the DamageType

      • setCustomDeathMessage

        void setCustomDeathMessage(java.lang.String deathmessage)
        Set a custom death message to this damage type. put "%d" (without ") as placeholder for a player name. This message will not be localized!
        Parameters:
        deathmessage - the death message to be set

      • getDeathMessage

        java.lang.String getDeathMessage(Player player)
        Get death message for this DamageSource
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to use to get the message
        Returns:
        the death message

      • getHungerDamage

        float getHungerDamage()
        How much hunger will be added by indulging this damage type
        Returns:
        float damage amount

      • setHungerDamage

        void setHungerDamage(float hunger)
        Set the amount of hunger this damage costs
        Parameters:
        hunger - the amount of damage

      • getDamageDealer

        Entity getDamageDealer()
        Get the entity that caused the damage. This may return null if damage wasn't caused by an entity!
        Returns:
        the Entity dealer

      • isUnblockable

        boolean isUnblockable()
        Check if this damage is unblockable (penetrates armor and can't be held off by blocking it)
        Returns:
        true if unblockable; false if not

      • setUnblockable

        void setUnblockable(boolean blockable)
        Set this damagetype as unblockable or not
        Parameters:
        blockable - true for unblockable; false for not

      • getNativeName

        java.lang.String getNativeName()
        Gets the name used within Native Minecraft Sources
        Returns:
        the name used within NMS

      • isCritical

        boolean isCritical()
        Gets if the DamageSource includes a critical hit.
        Returns:
        true if critical hit; false if not
